title: BusinessAppInstall
description: Represents the installation of an app for a business, linking the app to a commercial agreement (offering) when applicable.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the installation record.

business_uid.description: The unique identifier of the business.

app_code_name.description: The unique logical identifier of the app (e.g., 'forms', 'email_marketing').

install_status.description: The current state of the app installation.

offering_uid.description: The unique identifier of the offering associated with this installation, if any.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the installation was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp of the most recent update to the installation status.
